Index >  IfPASVMode

IfPASVMode

Description

Returns or sets whether FTP passive mode is enabled.

Data type

bool

Default value

true

Syntax

.IfPASVMode = true;

Remarks

The default value is true.

When the value of the property is set to true (default), FTP passive mode is enabled.

When the value of the property is set to false, FTP active mode is disabled.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

FTPUpload
FTPUploadEx
FTPUploadAllAsMultiPageTIFF
FTPUploadAllAsPDF
FTPUploadAsMultiPagePDF
FTPUploadAsMultiPageTIFF
